roleset.name: be the same as

role.descr: attribute, quality in which two things are equal

example.name: both args
example.text: Right kidney size is roughly equal to left.

example.name: Equal things in one mention, with attribute
example.text: I think you are answering if two men are the " same " and not necessarily if they are equal in rights.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to equal.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. Updated by Claire for symmetry with verb relation.
